thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Just Another Day for Bitcoin—a 20% Plunge

author: Mike Bird
title: Just Another Day for Bitcoin—a 20% Plunge
text:
The price of bitcoin plunged by as much as 20% on Tuesday amid concerns about tighter regulation, with the volatile virtual-currency dipping below $12,000 for the first time since early December.
By early afternoon in London, bitcoin traded at $12,064, according to data provided by Coindesk.com—its biggest intraday fall since Dec. 22 and down about 40% from its peak of $19,783 last month.
Bitcoin...
